about.summary: Easily capture stdout/stderr of the current process and subprocesses.

name: capturer
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "2.1.1" %}

package:
    name: capturer
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: capturer-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/c/capturer/capturer-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 6d892baca28c32ba912d96dfc5d40972090437d7d8d1738453969a0700a272e4

build:
    number: 0
    skip: True  # [win]
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python

test:
    imports:
        - capturer

about:
    home: https://capturer.readthedocs.org
    license: MIT
    summary: 'Easily capture stdout/stderr of the current process and subprocesses.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
